Test #1: add
11 + 23 = 34 = 23 + 11 = 34
11 + 2 = 13 = 2 + 11 = 13
23 + 2 = 25 = 2 + 23 = 25
11 + 1234 = 1245 = 1234 + 11 = 1245
2 + 1234 = 1236 = 1234 + 2 = 1236
23 + 1234 = 1257 = 1234 + 23 = 1257
1000001245
1000000011
7134629179

Test #2: subtract
23 - 11 = 12
11 - 2 = 9
23 - 2 = 21
1234 - 11 = 1223
1234 - 23 = 1211
1234 - 2 = 1232
1234 - 1234 = 0
1000000000 - 1234 = 999998766
6134629179 - 1000000000 = 5134629179

Test #3: multiply_by_digit
11 * 1 = 11
23 * 2 = 46
11 * 9 = 99
23 * 9 = 207
6134629179 * 9 = 55211662611
99 * 9 = 891
99 * 10 = 990

Test #4: multiply
11 * 23 = 253
23 * 11 = 253
6134629179 * 99 = 607328288721

Test #5: half
half 23 = 11
half 6134629179 = 3067314589
half 1234 = 617

Test #6: divide
11 / 23 = 0
11 % 23 = 11
23 / 11 = 2
23 % 11 = 1
99 / 11 = 9
99 % 11 = 0
99 / 23 = 4
99 % 23 = 7
